summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to other legal team members, providing a courtesy copy of a court filing (ECF filing) related to the case. It demonstrates ongoing legal proceedings and communication within the defense team.

events.title: ECF Filing Submission
events.description: A court filing (referenced as Docket 326) was submitted electronically (ECF) by the defense team.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 24, 2021, from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim.
It transmits a courtesy copy of a court filing (ECF filing) to other defense team members Laura Menninger, Christian Everdel, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The filing is related to Docket 326 in the case, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The communication shows coordination within the defense legal team.
